## Basic properties

|  |        |
|------|--------------------|
| **Notation** | $X\sim\text{HG}(n, m, k)$  |
| **Range** | $\{0,\,1,\,2,\,3,\,...,\,k-1,\,k\}$ |
| **PMF** | $P(X = x) = \frac{\binom{n}{x} \binom{m}{k-x}}{\binom{m+n}{k}}$ |
| **Expectation** | $kn/(n+m)$ |

## `R` commands

[Here](https://stat.ethz.ch/R-manual/R-devel/library/stats/html/Hypergeometric.html) is the documentation for the suite of commands that let you work with the hypergeometric distribution in `R`:

```{r}
#| eval: false
dhyper(x, m, n, k)
phyper(q, m, n, k)
rhyper(ndraw, m, n, k)
```
